data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Castelao.
Bahia's Elber gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bahia throw-in in Ceara's half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Elber for the away team is judged to be offside.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Goal! Ceara take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Cleber Bomfim.
In the minute 12, That's a fine assist from Gabriel Lacerda.
Free kick Bahia.
Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ceara's half?
In the minute 15, Ceara's Cleber Bomfim is whistled for offside at Estadio Castelao.
Bahia are coming forward and Rodriguinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Fortaleza.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Ceara.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Goes of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 20, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Bahia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Fortaleza Bahia drive forward through Rossi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 29, Fernando Sobral for Ceara drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio Castelao.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 32, William Oliveira (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Ceara.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 38, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Nino Paraiba (Bahia) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 39, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Vinicius Goes. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Charles is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Charles is back on the pitch.
In the minute 43, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bahia throw-in in Ceara's half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bahia.
Gregore (Bahia) has received a yellow card from Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Ceara's area.
In the minute 45, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 45, Bahia to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Estadio Castelao.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Gregore with Daniel.
Rafael Sobis is replacing Cleber Bomfim for the home team.
In the minute 47, Free kick Bahia.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Bahia's Zeca misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Zeca for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bahia's half.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Rodriguinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
Ceara make their second substitution with Fabinho replacing William Oliveira.
In the minute 60, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Ernando's header is off-target for Bahia.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 62, Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Bahia are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 64, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
Ceara are pushing forward but Rafael Sobis's finish is wide of the goal.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Clayson is replacing Elber for Bahia at Estadio Castelao.
Roger Machado (Bahia) is making a third substitution, with Fernandao replacing Gilberto.
Ceara's Rafael Sobis attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 66, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Bahia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia at Estadio Castelao.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 69, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Bahia's Ernando gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 70, At Estadio Castelao, Ronaldo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Castelao with Manucho replacing Leandro Carvalho.
Ceara drives forward and Gabriel Lacerda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 74, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
It's now 2-0 in Fortaleza as Manucho scores for Ceara.
In the minute 76, Great play from Vinicius Goes to set up the goal.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 81, Rossi of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Rafael Sobis hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Fortaleza for Ceara.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 85, Saldanha is on a sub for Rossi for Bahia.
The away team replace Rodriguinho with Alesson.
Ceara make their fourth substitution with Ricardinho replacing Charles.
Bahia pushes forward through Saldanha, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Vinicius Goes with Wescley. This is the fifth substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bahia are pushing forward but Saldanha's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bahia's Saldanha breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bahia's half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Ceara.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
That's full-time at Estadio Castelao. The final score is 2-0.
